mapper.select:
select count(*) from expertation e left join product p on p.id=e.product_id left join writer_user wu on e.user_id=wu.id where e.online_progress !=0
and e.org_id=#{orgId}
and wu.realname like concat('%',#{queryName},'%' )
and e.expert_type =#{expertType}
and e.online_progress =1
and e.online_progress in(2,4,5)
and e.online_progress =3
